frameset.edef: to uglify, to make fun of

example.parse: (TOP (S (S (SBAR-SBJ-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON اِللِّي)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِعايِر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN حَدّ)) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN_PROP مَصْر)))) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NOUN رِزْق) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه))))))) (ADVP (NOUN فَقَط)) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (ADJ.VN ناسِي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (SBAR (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (NP-TPC-4 (DET+ADJ المَصْرِي)) (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3MS+IV ياخُد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN ثَمَن) (NP (NP (NOUN جَهْد) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN عَمَل) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN عِلْم) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG خِبْرَة) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه))))))))
